revised_title: Environmental Pollution in Offshore Oil Operations: Challenges and Contingency Plans
tldr: This article discusses the efforts of the oil industry to minimize environmental pollution in offshore operations. It highlights the role of the Oil Industry International Exploration and Production Forum (E&P Forum) in coordinating industry opinion with governments and intergovernmental agencies. The article also presents the lessons learned from offshore oil production in areas like the Gulf of Mexico and the challenges of expanding operations into deeper waters. The importance of international cooperation and contingency plans for oil spill cleanup is emphasized.
